review: The Chromecast makes it EXTREMELY easy to cast some services to your TV, the only reason why it got 4 stars is because it cant cast everything.
author: Carlton

review: Amazing, Amazing device. We use this in the bedroom with our second TV where we don't have a cable box or gaming console for streaming. Recently added HBO GO
author: Amazon Customer

review: I expected the installation to be as simple as the two Roku boxes I have installed. I could not get through the apps store on my HTC Incredible. When I used my laptop to download the setup app, I received an obtuse wireless connection error message with no explanation of what was wrong or how to fix it. The Google Chromecast may be a wonderful product but the installation process is not ready for prime time.
author: Bob Poirier

review: I like the product for watching Netflix and Youtube content. My main reason I purchased was to beam out of market NHL games onto my TV with the cast tab feature. Although it works, the picture quality is awful and the lag is horrific. I hardwired my laptop to our router to get a better picture quality. Other than that, I'm excited for future updates and newer applications. I love not having to run my PS3 just to watch Netflix on my TV now though .
author: interjector

review: Amazing product :) and is also cheap, easy to setup, my friends love it !!!Response times are faster than other similar prods (apple tv) oh ! and it's 1080 !! :)
author: Ed

review: great way to stream netflix and a couple other apps to HDMI tv.  big miss at this point is that I cannot stream everything from my IOS device to it.  no picture or browsers...all in all excellent device for netflix and pandora
author: McCloughan

review: Works exactly as advertised and for an unbelievably low price.  Very clear reception on Netflix and YouTube.  Being able to stream more apps through the device would be better, but for the price, this thing is terrific.
author: B. K. Buff "bbuff101"

review: 2 days ... still cant manage to find my WiFi.  Im sure it will be great if I can get it to connect
author: Peter Rawlins

review: This thing is amazing! I'm a techie and it's one of the better items I have purchased.  Buy it now before Google realizes it could sell it for 3 times as much.  The best part is that it's not a "mirroring" tool.  It actually casts the video so you are free to use your phone/tablet for other things.  You can even turn your device off!  Great for battery saving too.  USB cord can hook into your TV for constant power.  Only a few apps (Netflix, Hulu, YouTube, and HBO Go), but you can be sure many more will be coming in the near future.
author: Tony T

review: I bought this specifically to use with Netflix, so I knew going in that the content that was compatible was limited, but that was fine with me. For thirty-five bucks, you CAN NOT GO WRONG. It's so easy to set up; took me all of five minutes before I was watching YouTube and Netflix. Quality is fantastic.
author: Dan Buczynski
